places.name: Hambrgr
places.summary: Best burgers in Burlington. Locally sourced beef, creative toppings. Always busy on weekends.
places.whySteven: Perfect carnivore option — quality meat, no pretentious menu. Great for a solo dinner.
tips: Go before 6pm on weekends to avoid the wait
The Dirty Burger is the signature

places.name: The Martini House
places.summary: Upscale cocktail bar with great ambiance. Perfect for date nights or sophisticated solo drinks.
places.whySteven: Classy spot for when you want somewhere nicer than a pub but not a club.

places.name: Spencer Smith Park
places.summary: Waterfront park with walking trails, beach area, and stunning lake views. The best sunset spot in Burlington.
places.whySteven: Free, beautiful, and perfect for clearing your head. Walking distance from downtown.

places.name: Radius Restaurant
places.summary: Upscale steakhouse with waterfront views. Premium cuts, excellent service, special occasion spot.
places.whySteven: Best steak in Burlington. Go here when you want to treat yourself properly.

places.name: The Parlour
places.summary: Cozy Italian spot known for wood-fired pizza and house-made pasta. Great vibe.
places.whySteven: Reliable Italian with good meat options. The atmosphere makes it feel like a find.

places.name: The Coop Wicked Chicken
places.summary: Nashville hot chicken and southern comfort food. Casual, lively, generous portions.
places.whySteven: Perfect for when you want fried chicken done right. The hot chicken sandwich is excellent.
tips: Get the Nashville Hot if you like spice

places.name: Burlington Waterfront Trail
places.summary: Scenic trail along Lake Ontario. Perfect for walking, running, or cycling. Connects to the beach.
places.whySteven: Best free activity in Burlington. Clear your head with a waterfront walk.

places.name: The Dickens
places.summary: Pub atmosphere with good beer selection and pub food. Great for casual meetups.
places.whySteven: Reliable pub for low-key nights. Good beer list, decent food, easy vibe.
tips: Good selection of local craft beer
They show sports if that's your thing

areaGuides.description: Walkable main strip along Brant St and Lakeshore Rd. Best density of restaurants and bars in Burlington.
areaGuides.bestFor: Friday night out, weekend brunch, evening walks by the lake

areaGuides.description: The lakefront area with parks, trails, and waterfront restaurants. Best views in the city.
areaGuides.bestFor: Sunset walks, outdoor activities, summer evenings

dayTrips.name: Niagara-on-the-Lake Wine Tour
dayTrips.summary: 20+ wineries in a beautiful small town. Self-guided tour hitting 3-4 wineries, lunch at a vineyard restaurant.
tips: Start at Trius, end at Peller Estates for the underground tour
Don't drive — book a wine shuttle

dayTrips.name: Toronto Day Trip
dayTrips.summary: World-class food, museums, neighborhoods to explore. Kensington Market, Distillery District, St. Lawrence Market.
tips: Take the GO Train to avoid parking

dayTrips.name: Hamilton Waterfalls
dayTrips.summary: Hamilton has 100+ waterfalls. Webster's Falls and Tew's Falls are the most spectacular.
tips: Combine with James St North for lunch
